overview: Chocolate cake focuses on the sexual relationship between Ximena (América Colchado) and Said (Charlie Díaz), this being a "consensual rape", since Ximena, due to social pressure, decides not to be honest with Said and maintain the relationship without her real identity. approval, Ximena understands his grief and prefers to keep everything the same.
tagline: A TODDLER MISTAKE CAN CHANGE EVERYTHING.
title: Chocolate Cake
